WHOO HOO!! Good to see different ones returning!! :)

I have been taking on=
 the roles of many of the background characters to keep
the group moving, b=
ut the ones I have are yours if you like.

Currently Waspinator is with Hyd=
ras on his way to the Valley Mine City,
along with Tarantulus, Terrorsaur, =
and 4 of the Fuzors: Injector, Buzzclaw,
Terrorgator, and Quickstrike. The =
group is being escorted/guarded/watched by
Tankor along with several tank d=
rones.

So far Wapinator appears to be loyal to Hydras, but I will leave it=
 to you
if that remains that way.

Silverbolt and Cheetor are at the Ark, p=
retty much watching over the drama
of Tuscon and Rodimus. You can check out=
 recent posts for that if you  like.


Tankor, were you planning on wanting=
 Tankor back as well?

Also, as a side note to all, with so many characters=
 hitting the playing
field I may also be dialing back what I am doing to al=
low for more freedom
for others. What this means is that I will slowly be l=
etting go of my
background characters, and allow others to fill in as they =
go. I am not
dropping everything at once, and will try to make this as smoo=
th as
possible.

If there is anything I can do to help anyone PLEASE feel f=
ree to talk to me
on or off list.

Preston

WHOO HOO!! Good to see different ones returning!! :)<br><br>I have been tak=
ing on the roles of many of the background characters to keep the group mov=
ing, but the ones I have are yours if you like. <br><br>Currently Waspinato=
r is with Hydras on his way to the Valley Mine City, along with Tarantulus,=
 Terrorsaur, and 4 of the Fuzors: Injector, Buzzclaw, Terrorgator, and Quic=
kstrike. The group is being escorted/guarded/watched by Tankor along with s=
everal tank drones. <br>
<br>So far Wapinator appears to be loyal to Hydras=
, but I will leave it to you if that remains that way. <br><br>Silverbolt a=
nd Cheetor are at the Ark, pretty much watching over the drama of Tuscon an=
d Rodimus. You can check out recent posts for that if you=A0 like. <br>
<br=
>Tankor, were you planning on wanting Tankor back as well?<br><br>Also, as =
a side note to all, with so many characters hitting the playing field I may=
 also be dialing back what I am doing to allow for more freedom for others.=
 What this means is that I will slowly be letting go of my background chara=
cters, and allow others to fill in as they go. I am not dropping everything=
